segments.text: It ’ s freezing in here ! Can I turn up the heat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t touch that thermostat ! You don ’ t pay the bills around here !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dad ! Are you serious ? What ’ s the point of having central heating if we can ’ t use it ! Look , I can see my breath !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Put on a sweater ! I ’ m not gonna let you run up my heating bill just because it ’ s a bit chilly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dad ! I ’ m gonna catch a cold !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I was your age , my parents didn ’ t have central heating like you do ! We had a furnace in the center of the living room and that was it . We used it to cook , heat the house and even dry our clothes ! We never caught a cold . You should be grateful !
segments.speaker: S2
